Reviews.Title: Bracket is not as advertised...
Reviews.Author: LaRhubarb
Reviews.Content: I received my camera today and I suppose it will do.  One initial disappointment is that the last statement in the product description: "NOTE: The bracket is now like the one you see in the last picture and is the same color as the camera. It is no longer the metal bracket you see." is false.  I got the cheap, round, sheet metal bracket as shown in the earlier pictures.  Beware.  It was this false bracket comment that made me decide to go with this vendor given some similar ads.

Reviews.Title: Look authentic but blinking light drains batteries
Reviews.Author: Richard Nelsen
Reviews.Content: Everything was as expected from these fake cameras except the blinking LED was advertised to last a year on a set of batteries and only lasted 2 months - twice.

Reviews.Title: My Neighbors love them.
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: I installed 2 and my neighbors went crazy.  My good neigbors love them.  My bad neighbors hate them. They look so real that electricians asked me where i got them. The flasing light works great.  My cameras were silver.  I will probably buy 2 more just to keep back in case the others ever stop flashing. I have enjoyed sitting out side and watching my neighbors react.

Reviews.Title: Great fake
Reviews.Author: Gustavo L. Lopez
Reviews.Content: This is an extremely real looking camera.  Its easy to put up and gives a very convincing appearance.  I would have given it five stars but for two reasons.  1.  The batteries dont last longer than 60 days.  2.  The replacement latch for the batteries is in an awkward position, considering the fact that you have to replace them every 60 days.

Reviews.Title: This thing is awesome
Reviews.Author: Administrative Assistant "AA"
Reviews.Content: This thing looks realistic enough.  And if you choose to you can even have it blink, but then you do have to remember to change the batteries.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor Dummy Security Camera w/ blinking Light
Reviews.Author: Perry T. Barrett "Perry Barrett "Biblioph...
Reviews.Content: Looks like the real deal. Well constructed. Strong blinking light. Easy to install. Best buy on the web, bar none.

Reviews.Title: Looks real, a good value
Reviews.Author: J. J.
Reviews.Content: Just received the camera - impressed with how it looks.  From the comments here regarding the short battery life I probably will not use that feature.  Note - the plastic bracket as shipped needed to be removed and flipped over for the camera to set up as seen in photo - not a big deal but annoying as there are no instructions...I can see how someone might try to force the camera to swivel and end up breaking the plastic.  Update: batteries lasted less than a month - thus the 3 stars.

Reviews.Title: Fake Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Island relaxor
Reviews.Content: Camera looks real and I like the flashing red LED light. Everyone who visits thinks it is the real thing. Very good quality and fast delivery. Purchased a second one too!

Reviews.Title: Looks Convincing, But Cover Falls Off
Reviews.Author: Frequent Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We purchased this outdoor fake security camera just as an added measure to dissuade juvenile intruders at one of our properties.  It looks quite convincing when mounted high enough over the front door that people cannot see it up close.  It has a perpetually blinking red light in what looks like a lens, which helps.  However, unfortunately, the sliding cover that is supposed to slide over the battery compartment on top of the camera had no stops on the camera we received.  It slides right off the camera, and there is no way to make it stay on.  We had to use duct tape in back and hope that holds it.  Either the one we received was defective, or the camera is manufactured in a bad way -- so that the cover may be prone to slide off, with no way to attach it to the camera.  For an item of this price, it is too much trouble to pack it up and ship it back.  The seller should replace a defective one, without the need to ship it back.

Reviews.Title: GREAT VALUE
Reviews.Author: Bonuswagna
Reviews.Content: The faux camera's arrived very timely from the shipper. They are very realistic looking, and exactly as shown in the pictures. They have a nice gun-metal, satin finish on them. The base is the same color as the camera. The battery cover is underneath the camera cover, which unclips easily, and refastens securely. A previous review had problems with the battery cover, but no problems here.Overall, very happy buying 6 of them. I will use some at my home, and the rest up at our cabin. They should provide some measure of deterrence while were away from the place. At the very least, they will put some doubt in people's minds, which is not a bad value at [...] bucks each.

Reviews.Title: Works Just Like It's Supposed To
Reviews.Author: Chris J. Green
Reviews.Content: These cameras have fooled everyone that has seen them, and they are a great deterrent.

Reviews.Title: Real enough looking
Reviews.Author: TingTahWan
Reviews.Content: This product looks real enough despite the entire assembly being plastic.  I mounted mine approximately 10' feet high so nobody tall can reach it and touch it to discover it is fake.  The decal is really corny looking so I opted to use a decal from a real security monitoring provider in the area.

Reviews.Title: not like the old days !
Reviews.Author: bill
Reviews.Content: Put it this way I have been in the security business for years, and yes the dummie camera's of the past you could pick out in a heart beat, not  no more if I put these on a table with the real thing, you would not be able to tell the difference, unless you actually picked them up and then the weight would give it away, well when you have one of these hung on all four corners of your house with a cue light blinking your neighbor will think you just spent a grand or so on a great system, 90% off all breakins our due to if you show a deterence factor, there going to choose the house that does not have camera's perring at them over the ones that don't every time. The Key to this product is you tell NO ONE ! they are fake you just tell them for security reasons it goes through your computer and you leave it at that, you would be surprised at the % of robberies started  from your inner circle ,which means it's some one you bragged to about having this or that and service ppl you hire are amoung that circle as well, I can't stress enough about who you TELL that they are not REAL and make sure you keep up on your batteries as they will start fading in about 3 months, I had customers that could not afford the real thing and sold them these instead ,and have had several call me back and say our neighborhood just got hit and they hit nearly every house or shed in the back yard but there home !!! and there neighbors on each side of there home as well were not touched probably in fear they would get caught on camera, so the proof is in the pudding ,you add some window and door decals and a yard sign and I promise you it will make the DIFFERENCE! as once again deterrance is 90% of the battle so for this price you woould be a fool in these crazy times not to set your home up with a dummy that does not look like a dummy, the only dummy is the guy who is not taking precations to appear or truly have a system of some kind. so these bullets style camera's are some of the best I have seen and the even have a cable that make's it appear that it's wired into your home so you can't go wrong,not buying them is just plain foolish at these prices with a 18 % national crime rate since 2008, this alone tells me what the future is bringing, so give your self a fighting chance !

Reviews.Title: Camara dummy
Reviews.Author: john garcia
Reviews.Content: installed the cameras and I like to look real and the LED indicator light is seen in full daylight operation

Reviews.Title: Fake Security Camera - Excellent buy
Reviews.Author: Neil from Texas
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product for a property that is seldom occupied. It looks the part and provides an excellent visible warning with the blinking red light. It was much better than expected and I bought more.

Reviews.Title: You have to do some alterations
Reviews.Author: R. Tolentino
Reviews.Content: Took my flat black spray paint and repainted the entire unit minus the lens where LED flashes of course to make it look more authentic... does the job so far.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted!!!
Reviews.Author: Gracie Petrowsky
Reviews.Content: These are working great and look so real; I put them up in November and the batteries are still working; so happy about that!I have them on my telephone poles coming in the property up high so it looks really real.

Reviews.Title: not only works with dummys
Reviews.Author: Hydroman "ROOT-A-DRAIN"
Reviews.Content: This fake/dummy camera works the led blinking light still blinking strong over one months 2 aa batteries not included,this fake camera is worth 11 dollars every one so far thinks its real

Reviews.Title: Wrong color description
Reviews.Author: GRT2FLY
Reviews.Content: I have bought this camera before and it is realistic particularly when mounted up higher however the description stated it was dark grey with hues of purple.  That is completely wrong - it is flat out purple with not even a hint of grey.  In fact the box shows 3 colors - Black - Silver or Purple.  This was clearly the purple one.The others I had bought were from another company on Amazon and were indeed grey.  This is false representation and I assume because no one would probably want a purple camera.

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm..
Reviews.Author: badboy4unix "badboy4unix"
Reviews.Content: Bought  four of these to put around the property and house.  Run about two months on a set of AA's.  Look VERY  REALISTIC.  Easy Installation.  What I like is I can  put one a few hundred feet from the house at the  driveway entrance and point it so  those entering the drive  SEE  the pretty red flashing light.  I tell all my neighbors "I am wired" on CCD  camera's tied into "the net" and my "national alarm service company". "I can watch my house from anywhere in the world'  ;-)  A must buy...

Reviews.Title: color wrong otherwise good
Reviews.Author: semanager11
Reviews.Content: The color was more purple than dark gray. Other than that they are very realistic looking. I wouldnt put batteries in it. The blinking light looks cheap. I ended up spray painting mine black. Not bad for the price

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with product.A great buy for the money.Looks very real and fools everyone.Not one person has yet to figure out its a fake.So well built for the money,and well worth buying.Don't know how they do it for the price they charge.

Reviews.Title: It's Okay
Reviews.Author: DeeJay
Reviews.Content: The security camera may not fool anyone because it does not look real up close.  Also the decal that come with it is pretty cheesy.  I did not put it up with the dummy camera.  I did install the camera and the light blinks as advertised, but I'm not impressed.  Because it is stationary, it can be avoided by just going to another part of the house to break in.  That being said, it is as described. and looks exactly like the advertisement promoting it.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: BAT LIFE
Reviews.Content: Wow! What a tough fake camera! Exceeded my personal expectations. Bought 2 years ago and still working. Batteries last me about 3-4 months.

Reviews.Title: Good Deal for price
Reviews.Author: Daniel J Hadam
Reviews.Content: Looks Real, blinking light gets noticed.  All my neighbors think I have a proffessional security system installed. Would reccomend to anyone.

Reviews.Title: awesome fakes
Reviews.Author: ALK "AK"
Reviews.Content: these look great. i would say if you are looking for fake security cameras these are for you.Looks good from distance and not soo bad from up close

Reviews.Title: They Are Really Good
Reviews.Author: ssamdy45
Reviews.Content: Look very much like real deal. Hide the cord up inside the ceiling tile and looks good. Worth the price.

Reviews.Title: It's PURPLE.. anyone ever see a REAL PURPLE camera.. ever?
Reviews.Author: AMZN_FanBoi
Reviews.Content: Disclaimer: The color (PURPLE) was not in the description when I ordered mine. Now it is clearly stated.Had I known it was PURPLE, I would NOT have bought the camera.Has anyone ever seen a working security camera in PURPLE? I don't. I haven't. That doesn't mean they don't exist. They probably do. But if I'm out there trying to con a would-be thief into thinking I have a "working" security camera - a PURPLE one is probably not going to work.PROs:- If it wasn't purple, it probably should work.- Sturdy build- Hardware includedCONs:- It's PURPLE- "Yellow Security Sticker" NOT included (at least in my shipment, and it appears at least one other person did not receive theirs)

Reviews.Title: Dummy Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Albert
Reviews.Content: I am well pleased with the Dummy Security Camera that I ordered from Amazon.  With the blinking red light, it looks like the real thing.  I highly recommend this item for those, like me, that cannot afford something more expensive.

Reviews.Title: Love them!
Reviews.Author: C. andries "cinderella"
Reviews.Content: Installed 3 of these to go with my already installed real cameras. They are great! I added extra wire to make them look more authentic. Also bought 2 more surveillance signs that look great. I placed them up high and you can't tell the difference from the real ones! Love them!

Reviews.Title: looks good and ....
Reviews.Author: MIKEHOMBRE!!!
Reviews.Content: well, great price, looks real, i believe it deters some people. can t complain about anything.....except that i have to get up there and change the battery ever so often. looks kind of weird if someone would see me climbing up and changing the battery. but all in all, its a good product and great pricing. one more thing we have to help deter those would be thieves.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: magnoncb
Reviews.Content: I bought this after someone opedned the door to my car in the middle of the night. Along with the CCTV sticker it has come with, it worked great. Small blinking red light. and a small plastic tube to act as the cable that is made to look like it goes through the wall where the camera is mounted.

Reviews.Title: I would not recommend this product
Reviews.Author: Stormy Livendale "Stormy"
Reviews.Content: It took *forever* to receive the item. When I contacted the manufacturer they were no help. On top of that I ordered two of these and one was incomplete. The arm on the camera doesn't hold and the battery ran out within a week.

Reviews.Title: Just right!
Reviews.Author: R. Miller
Reviews.Content: This looks great and the blinking red light is bright enough to be seen from the street. Installation was a breeze.

Reviews.Title: Looks good
Reviews.Author: Anthony Brusatori
Reviews.Content: Battery lasts a long time, the back plastic could look more realistic but other than that it looks great and looks real.

Reviews.Title: look real
Reviews.Author: William E. Horn
Reviews.Content: set up and I have people wave at the camera.  Not bad for the price and mixed with live cctv looks good

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: Tired of deception
Reviews.Content: Put them up a few days back, next door thinks they are real, I think they look real. Its easy to put the batteries in, pop the rain guard top off, you'll see the battery lid, push clip, pop off put 2 AA batteries in, close up install, adjust. I using in conjunction with my home alarm system which has a siren on reach side of the house, I mounted these right next to the siren. Good price, Fry's has them for a little more. I do believe these are blanks and they actually use these to manufacture function cameras.

Reviews.Title: PLASTIC JUNK
Reviews.Author: Lee Cambria
Reviews.Content: This is a piece of cheap plastic junk that would not fool anyone.  Maybe if it was placed 200 feet up high where it couldn't be well seen - but it would probably fall apart the first week?  If the description had said plastic, I never would have purchased it.  It is a throw away and not worth the shipping to return it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: djwtarheel
Reviews.Content: I added a few of these cameras to the outside of my home...they look quite real and a few of my neighbors have been completely fooled...including one neighbor who was hamming it up for our camera thinking we were watching (which we were from the window)... They are plastic and light weight and the blinking light adds a bit of realism to the camera (although I noted other reviewers stating they eat batteries quickly.).  I'm satisfied with this product and would recommend it as a cheap theft deterent.

Reviews.Title: Good little unit so far
Reviews.Author: Ann in Dallas
Reviews.Content: Due to some recent break-ins, purchased and installed one of these at the back of a detached garage.  Am pleased with how authentic the unit looks from a distance and the red-blinking light.Up close it looks pretty cheaply made.  Comes in a plain box with no instructions, but does include screws and plastic inserts for use in the wood to control expansion.  That last part is a nice touch.From a deterrent stand-point, the cheapness factor does not come into play.  (Who cares if it looks cheaply made up close when it's realistic from a distance?)  Where the cheapness factor does come into play is the battery cover.  May be my unit, but had a fair amount of difficulty getting the cover to align properly and close.PROS -  Visually highly realistic.  Compliments bronze/brown house paint well. -  Red blinking light. -  Installation hardware. -  Price.CONS -  Battery cover seems cheaply made.COMMENTS ON COMMENTS -  Some claim company is shipping a different unit.  Not mine.  Received the same product as pictured on Amazon. -  Battery life.  Too early to tell how good/bad.  Installed the unit one month ago and as one would hope the light is still blinking. -  Sliding cover sliding off.  Not mine.  Nice interference fit. -  Awkward position of battery cover.  Agree, but where else could the manufacturer have put it?  Think when time comes to change batteries, will simply unscrew the swivel pivot nut and remove the entire camera.  If battery life is short and I tire of changing them, will likely go the no-light route.UPDATE:  04-04-2011-------------------First set of AA alkaline batteries lasted three months.  Not bad when you consider the brightness of the light and blink-rate frequency.

Reviews.Title: You can tell it's fake
Reviews.Author: Orin
Reviews.Content: I have a real camera system set up at my house.  My dad just wanted something fake to place in view from the front gate which is about 5 feet from this front door (he lives in a condo).  First off the item looks obviously fake.  If you've never seen a real CCTV camera in person, you might think it looks real but it's obviously a fake.Second, I didn't use the batteries for him.  Trust me, real cameras don't blink like this.  The real ones have all the LEDs glowing red constantly for the night vision.  If I see anything blinking like this, I know it's obviously a fake and any would-be burglur/thief probably would also.Honestly with the cheap plastic construction, I don't expect this to last too long being out in the elements. I only gave it two stars instead of one because it was cheap.

Reviews.Title: fool you
Reviews.Author: Wampum
Reviews.Content: This camera looks great, just like the real ones.  I live next to a walnut orchard and their workers keep stealing our garden tools.  We are going to put this dummy camera up with a sign that says "Smile you're on camera" in spanish and english.  I hope it works, we will see. If not we can put up a real one.  Nice fake, it looks real.

Reviews.Title: Who knows?
Reviews.Author: Video Services Of Va
Reviews.Content: It looks exactly like real cameras. Mounts easily. Battery doesn't last a whole long time (maybe 6 months) but when its working it looks great. No one knows... just sayin...

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: Same Ole - SE MO
Reviews.Content: The 'camera' is a little on the large side and the 'cord' could be a little longer, but it still looks very real.  The item description is totally accurate.  The batteries have lasted 8 weeks, so far, and overall, i am satisfied with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor Fake Security Camera
Reviews.Author: chelle2906
Reviews.Content: This fake camera is okay. We've had some good comments on it but we've also had some "Is that camera fake?" questions so you'd have to judge for yourself. I'd probably look for something that looks a little more authentic in future.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Product
Reviews.Author: David Franck
Reviews.Content: Absolute waste of money.  This camera will fool no one.  Your better off spending $4 on the fake dome cameras.

Reviews.Title: Should help deter
Reviews.Author: Marc K "An old rocker"
Reviews.Content: Looks pretty cheap close up, but from a distance it probably will deter most random nuisances from vandalizing or burgling your home.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: zach
Reviews.Content: They work really well and do what I need them todo and what they were designed for. hahahah lol epic

Reviews.Title: cameras
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: everything you need but wish they drew more attention. They blend in because of the colors and I actually want them to be seen

Reviews.Title: Fake Security Camera looks real!
Reviews.Author: AT "MA"
Reviews.Content: The outdoor security camera looks real because of the blinking light. I recommended it to my neighbor and she loves it too.

Reviews.Title: looks like the real thing
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: This fake camera looks like the real thing!  and I like the color, it blends in with the house but is still noticeable.

Reviews.Title: "Just what the Doctor ordered"
Reviews.Author: Richard L.
Reviews.Content: The items were delivered earlier than I anticipated and were realistic and easy to install. They are mounted high enough that a potential burglar will need a ladder to check out the authenticity of the items. Dick

Reviews.Title: Works well and realistic
Reviews.Author: Joseph Schiavone
Reviews.Content: Light will blink steady and bright for a little over 3 months on a pair of batteries. Only negative is changing the batteries requires a take apart.

Reviews.Title: Dummy camera Smart Choice!
Reviews.Author: Brainfiglio
Reviews.Content: This dummy camera not only looks real but the blinking LED light is still going strong now for 11 months. This dummy camera is the smart choice when the real thing doesn't fit the budget.Brainfiglio Speaks

Reviews.Title: looks real!
Reviews.Author: Henry J
Reviews.Content: It looks realistic.  It may not fool everyone but if it deters even one burglar it has more than paid for the $14 it cost.

Reviews.Title: Not the color shown
Reviews.Author: Extremely Satisfied with Pink Moose Company
Reviews.Content: I purchased this  dummy camera to put up to deter problem neighbors from dumping on my property in the back wooded area; I have Night Owl security cameras and thought this would match in so no one would know it was fake --- guess what it is not as pictured it came and was very light grey in color. The fake cord was only a few inches long making it hard to disguise that it was fake. I took apart the back and removed the short cord and bought a cheap look alike at the hardware store and replaced it with a very long cord that I then buried into the ground. The led lighting in it at night is realistic. The batteries, although necessary to get the led lights to work, are a bit of a pain to replace because if its to be a real camera why would you have batteries???Still, all in all despite the few flaws noted I would still purchase this same item.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Carl R. Schroeder III
Reviews.Content: I added to my real cameras around the house!!!  Nobody knows which ones are real!!!  Great to put around places that are not traveled as much.

Reviews.Title: looks good
Reviews.Author: Bdaddy
Reviews.Content: fake but realistic looking great for my moms ghetto neighbor hood with all the thugs running around.  works great also

Reviews.Title: avocado thieves
Reviews.Author: GG
Reviews.Content: Looks great, I hope it does the job. I have been battling avo thieves for a long time.  Looks like the real thing

Reviews.Title: for dummies?
Reviews.Author: Jim Savoy "Simple Jim"
Reviews.Content: I have had and issue with a nosey neighborhood watch wannabe entering my rear gate and lurking about. She a 60 something bitty and this has kept here awfulness away. It looks real enough to give the idiots pause, which is what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Delicious notes:
Reviews.Author: Donald P. Urban "The Vicar"
Reviews.Content: This is a GREAT Dummy (and I oughta know one when I see one).  I have only two comments.  There is a notice included with the "camera" that fake cameras are only useful as augments to a REAL security system, in order to make it "more robust".  Don't believe them . . . the thieves in my neighborhood are SO STOOPID that the flashing red light alone will make them move on to the next house.  I just wish EVERYONE on my street had one of these.  Also, I noted that Amazon often recommends that you buy a pack of warning stickers to put additional fear in to the droopy-drawers (pants-on-the-ground) of potential thieves . . . don't waste your money - practically EVERY fake camera sold comes with one or two of those generic warning stickers.  Keep those red-led's flickering!  Buy-the-Whey . . . I got the one with the realistic molded-plastic bracket...very sleek.

Reviews.Title: This product is excellent!
Reviews.Author: Jack Eaton
Reviews.Content: This product is excellent! It gives me an added sense of security with this purchase. Thank you so very much!

Reviews.Title: Cool
Reviews.Author: John C. Mai "Tallturtle"
Reviews.Content: Great ;) nice item definitely useful. Be nice if it came with a sign ;) but it's ok ! I'm glad I purchased

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Mason-Coyner
Reviews.Content: We put this up in the alley behind our house where each house has a dumpster assigned. Lots if people used to dump their trash and mattresses etc...back there and we couldn't stop them. Now it seems with the camera we rarely catch anyone dumping.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive and cheap...
Reviews.Author: Jlaurencew
Reviews.Content: I ordered two cameras and the first one I took out of the box, the camera portion broke off of the mounting bracket after making a minor adjustment. It cost about $15 per camera, but worth more like $8. After some glue and tape, the cameras are up and look decent. The blinking red light almost screams 'fake camera'.  You may not want to put batteries in it for this reason.

Reviews.Title: Camera review
Reviews.Author: "J" golfer
Reviews.Content: The camera looks very real and the red light is outstanding.It was easy to intall and I sure I will be purchasing more units in the future.

Reviews.Title: look real
Reviews.Author: Bradford L. Simonds
Reviews.Content: These are very real looking and when i installed some where i didn't have enough real cameras even i have to look twice to know which ones are which.

Reviews.Title: Great fake cam
Reviews.Author: Massimo
Reviews.Content: Fast shipment (although it was shipped to wrong house on account of postal worker fault..luckily a neighbor walked it to me).. No directions.  Took a few minutes to figure out how to open battery compartment.  You need to lift off the very top cover that reads Cam on it, then open up the back, black cover and insert 2 AAA batteries.  It does not unscrew unless u lift off this top cover piece.  Once I did that, easy to install, screw in.  Looks great.

Reviews.Title: fake camera
Reviews.Author: pinaybaby
Reviews.Content: bought in december.. careful with the plastic casings.. loosen bolts before adjusting..easy setup and hanging..has been in place with batteries since december and doing fine .. light still working.. looks convincing.. also added signs saying property is being video taped ,,etc.. overall would recommend to anyone..!!

Reviews.Title: good to have
Reviews.Author: content buyer
Reviews.Content: if you need to make people afraid of being on your property when you are not home then you need one of these.If someone is going to vandalize or steal your property,they will have second thoughts when they see the blinking red light

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Gregory C. Godic
Reviews.Content: To start, this was only $15 so I didn't expect too much.  But the camera does not even stay up because the mount is so flimsy.  Buy a real camera instead.

Reviews.Title: Looks real!
Reviews.Author: Willram
Reviews.Content: Gotta say, this fake camera looks so real that it makes me feel almost secure.  seems to be keeping my pest y neighbor in line and the color is not as wierd as it sounds.  Decent quality but haven't had it up long so not sure how it will survive bad weather.

Reviews.Title: Very Purple color makes it look fake
Reviews.Author: Mactech
Reviews.Content: the description stated it was dark grey with hues of purple. That is completely wrong - it is flat out purple with not even a hint of grey. In fact the box shows 3 colors - Black - Silver or Purple. This was clearly the purple one.The others I had bought were from another company on Amazon and were indeed grey. This is false representation and I assume because no one would probably want a purple camera.

Reviews.Title: Don't get the color
Reviews.Author: crtreporter
Reviews.Content: This is a very real looking fake security camera.  I like everything about it, except the color.  I thought it would be dark grey, with a hint of purple.  Wrong.  It's purple, period.  I would have given this camera five stars but for the color.  I don't get it.  I just hope no one looks at it too closely, because what real camera would be purple?

Reviews.Title: fake camera
Reviews.Author: cciardo
Reviews.Content: Very good deterring device. I am in the process of getting a real camera system and wanted to get something up before hand. This looks SO REAL, than when i look at, i think i'm on camera, and i put it up. I installed the 2 batteries for the red blinking light effect. I ordered 2 and gave one to my son for his house. I have recommended this to some friends as well.

Reviews.Title: Does the Trick!
Reviews.Author: J. Lewallen
Reviews.Content: I have used similar "fakes" before and so when I moved into a new place, I bought this one along with a few decals. When you mount this camera everyone will think that it is real...it looks the part and in my opinion would be a deterrent to anyone looking to burglarize your home.

Reviews.Title: Where are Stickers?
Reviews.Author: S. McLaughlin
Reviews.Content: Product as expected except we purchased two and no stickers supplied in either box.??  Very realistic especially with blinking light and appearance of electrical wire.

Reviews.Title: Inexpensive security..
Reviews.Author: Jerry Cowen
Reviews.Content: This will do the trick till and if you actually need a security system...Was surprised at the quality and effectivness of this dummy camera. If placed where noone can question it, it works great. Flashing red light makes it authenic...

Reviews.Title: Works Great So Far
Reviews.Author: Alfonso
Reviews.Content: Looks Real and easy to install. Received camera in 3 days and has been installed for 1 week now. Not sure how long it will last!

Reviews.Title: Just what we needed
Reviews.Author: Shawnna K. Patterson
Reviews.Content: We wanted extra "security" in our driveway besides the exterior light because we had a problem with someone slashing tires in cars in driveways in our neighborhood. This really looks like a camera, and we haven't had any problems with our cars being vandalized at all.

Reviews.Title: Sure looks real
Reviews.Author: Edward J. Baxter
Reviews.Content: It sure looks real! The only disappointment was that there is a smal plastic stop on the top of the housing to prevent it from sliding too much. Mine broke within seconds of pushing the camera in the holder. It shouldn't mean much. Overall, I'm quite pleased.

Reviews.Title: Security on the Cheap
Reviews.Author: Mr. Joel L. Sys "Tamango_racine"
Reviews.Content: A great addition to an existing active system or a passive system w/signs. Easy to install and looks extremely realistic.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Eric the Consumer.
Reviews.Content: They look really good.  But, lets face it, they are purple.  Surprisingly, it looks good on the side of the house.  The flashing light is nice, it makes it noticeable and at night makes it visible.  A peg broke on my hanging clasp and one screw twisted in half when I installed it, so the quality is so-so.  But, for $10 it is a great deal.  And if you want a cheap camera that looks real - then this is a good choice.

Reviews.Title: Neat little camera
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: I bought this to make an obvious display of video surveillance around my house. I have real cameras, but they are hidden. I dont want the real ones to be available for vandals to mess with. People see this one and ask about it. I have noticed significant behaviour differences of people (they dont turn in my driveway now for one).Only downside is that the cover on the top came off after a few weeks. It still looks like a camera without it, but it looked better with it.  Its plastic and not very sturdy.

Reviews.Title: Security Camera for the Dummies (Bad Guys).
Reviews.Author: Gordy
Reviews.Content: The Best fake camera I've seen lately. Would recommend to any more wanting to trick the bad guys. Very realistic!!!Gordy

Reviews.Title: looks very real
Reviews.Author: Mark "It's not about guns, It's about freedom"
Reviews.Content: They look so real that someone in a nearby house asked if we could see some vandalism that was done to their car because the camera looks like it's pointing close to it. Had to tell them NO didn't catch it.

Reviews.Title: feel and look "plastic"
Reviews.Author: T. LIN "tibalan"
Reviews.Content: The product has a look and feel of plastic. Not impressed by it at all. the red blinking LED is too bright and too blinking too fast, makes it looks fake.

Reviews.Title: Easy install, working fine 2 months later
Reviews.Author: JMann
Reviews.Content: I put in 2 of these 2 months ago and they are working fine on the first set of batteries.  Installation was easy - just make sure you have enough space between the mount and the ceiling...since you cannot mount them upside down.  They look real,even up close.  Good product.

Reviews.Title: Best Purchase Ever...
Reviews.Author: Bova Fett "Bova Fett"
Reviews.Content: We have had our fake dummy camera now for almost a year, and it has lasted just fine out in the Florida sun. It has not faded and is not worn out. It looks very real and has tricked even some of our family members that are cops.The only issue is replacing the batteries every 2 months, other then that its perfect. We plan to get about 3 more of these models and mix in some real ones as well.With the economy going down the toilet (thanks to the Federal Empire) and crime increasing, you can never be too safe since things are only going to get worse from this point onward.

Reviews.Title: Looks just like the picture.
Reviews.Author: C.Farr "Tek Geek"
Reviews.Content: Very realistic looking however I seriously doubt the description claim of being built from a real camera. Solid plastic and bracket would never hold enough weight for a real camera. Probably the best looking fake I have ever seen. For those who want to use the flashing light, the battery compartment is accessible by sliding the rain cover out of the way.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: Mark Wagner "MW"
Reviews.Content: Not bad for the price. You can put batteries in the top under the cap thingy for a blinking led light but I think its more realistic and intimidating without

Reviews.Title: people think twice..
Reviews.Author: Rack queen "rack queen"
Reviews.Content: this camera looks real and I catch people looking twice. People ask where we got our system and I just say online. no one needs to know its not real :)

Reviews.Title: Perfect.....
Reviews.Author: stupid
Reviews.Content: Looks like the real thing and is easy to install...so far so good bad guys stay away.....would recommend to a friend....

Reviews.Title: NO INSTRUCTIONS?
Reviews.Author: ELIZABETH G
Reviews.Content: I was excited to see this item available through Amazon.com thinking it was sure to be a quality product at a low price. However...the item arrived with no instructions included. The promised "blinking red light" to mimic a "real" security camera was impossible to activate-I unscrewed 10 of the tiniest phillips head screws I've ever encountered (both ends of the item) but could not find a battery connection. A series of 9 numbers under the seller's address promised to be a phone number but the voice mail "operator" did not mention the name UniquExceptional. I left a message anyway in the hope that my call would be returned by someone who can tell me how to make the red light "blink". The item was a great price but I've put WAY too much energy into a blinking light-I'm very annoyed and would never order this item again. NO INSTRUCTIONS?? Give me a break... As an aside-the purple plastic housing DOES NOT resemble a "real" metal housing.

Reviews.Title: I AM PUZZLED
Reviews.Author: Douglas Perkins "Life Can Be Fun"
Reviews.Content: I originally ordered 4 pieces through Amazon and they were exactly as I expected.Decided I needed one more and ordered through a different vendor on Amazon at a lower price as it was exactly the same picture.Received one that looked completely different and did not match the others.Finally decided to go back to the original Amazon vendor and order at the higher price and received ones that matched the first order.The more expensive ones ($17.00 each) look great and would fool the majority of people, the cheap ones would not fool my 95 year old mother and she can hardly see.

Reviews.Title: Video cameras/fake
Reviews.Author: elkinos
Reviews.Content: It's NOT what I thought it was...I received a diffrent camera ( 2).It showed a "name" on it before I made  the purchase.What I got was a  totally blank,no name,very,very lighted weight item,very disappointed and upset,even thought the price is low,I feel I was misled. I am just going to put it away,will not install them.Surprised that Amazon.com allows these type of  junk to be sold.I am aware it was supposed to be a "fake/dummy security camera but not THAT fake in workmanship.

Reviews.Title: Mount looks plastic!
Reviews.Author: Ognat
Reviews.Content: While the camera looks pretty realistic, the plastic mounting arm is a "dead giveaway."  Also the wire is really not long enough to do anything with that would look realistic.  Sent it back. :-(

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Jackiebug09
Reviews.Content: The bracket was as pictured in my experience. Everything was as pictured! the light is perfect, especially at night. This is exactly what i needed!

Reviews.Title: It's okay but wish it looked more realistic
Reviews.Author: Catherine Hunder
Reviews.Content: I like the blinking of the light in the product but wish the appearance would be more realistic. Doesn't look realistic if really looked at.

Reviews.Title: Lousy
Reviews.Author: Deborah Marlott
Reviews.Content: Would not give a high rating for this junk.Worked for a while, then the arm that turned, broke down and made alot of loud noise!Now it does not work at all!!!! JUNK!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: inexpensive deterrent
Reviews.Author: L. Frank
Reviews.Content: good price , looks real and may deter a criminal ,looks like it is wired as it has a blinking red light

Reviews.Title: Rubber Band
Reviews.Author: Ronald J. Ciraolo
Reviews.Content: They were not like the first ones I purchase. These you can tell were fack. I pained and modify them to make them look real.

Reviews.Title: CHEAPO CHILD'S TOY
Reviews.Author: Greg S
Reviews.Content: I am returning a pair of these because they look so ridiculous. I understand that they are FAKE cameras, but they look like a child's toy. The description hints at a purple hue, but these things are full blown Barney purple. Plus they are very flimsy cheap-looking plastic. They wouldn't even fool a fool. I recommend the ones that are made of aluminum and are actual real camera housings.

Reviews.Title: For the price...
Reviews.Author: Harry R. Jordan
Reviews.Content: Bought two to mount near trash cans at my Dad's office.  People kept dumping their trash in his dumpster and it got to the point that half the trash in the can wasn't even his.  Anyway, mount these high and away - they look good from a distance,but close up you can tell something is not right.  The red LED flashes about every 30 - 45 seconds, there's lots of plastic, kind of fake looking.  Also, the screw mount is plastic, so too much pressure and it cracks.

Reviews.Title: It's inexpensive, so it's not a bad value.
Reviews.Author: rewhitson
Reviews.Content: It's inexpensive so it's not a bad value. It wouldn't fool most people if they bothered to look very hard but for the price, it's not bad.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor security cameras
Reviews.Author: Libby
Reviews.Content: I can't really rate this purchase of 3 until I learn how to install.  None of the 3 came with instructions and while I know someone out there managed to put them up, I'm in a quandary.  In addition, when I tried to maneuver the cameras and face them outward, they wouldn't move.  Perhaps I need some advice ... anyone???

Reviews.Title: trying to return this item
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: This item looks very cheap and fake, I think someone trying to breal in your property could see this also, I have tried to return this item, you tell me to contact customer service, I have tried with no luck. You should have better policy for handling these problems. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Not Worth The Money
Reviews.Author: Nicole Maschke
Reviews.Content: Quite simply, the cameras came and the lights did not work.  That of course caused the cameras to appear to not be functioning.  While the company was quite eager to try and make things right, it is my feeling due to the quality of workmanship regarding this camera, or product, that the level of quality control regarding the production of this product would not guarantee that any replacement would work any better.  Again, this is not a reflection on the company.  But on the product.  Because the company did want to do anything to make things right.  But once again, because the quality of the camera gave me cause to believe that the level of quality control would not guarantee that a replacement would work any better, I have chosen to purchase any future security cameras from a more well-established, and/or reliable, source.  Once again, this is not a reflection on the company.  But the product.

Reviews.Title: I was the dummy.  Put your money toward a real one.
Reviews.Author: lighten_up_already2 "lighten_up_already2"
Reviews.Content: The picture let me to believe that this dummy camera had a metallic finish, but when you get it, in the plain white box with no instructions, you find it is obviously made of plastic.  So, this thing will have a use but it will be in back where the light is low and the "dummyness" of this camera is not obvious.  Real cameras aren't much more expensive, so put your money toward a real one.On the other hand, I mounted it in a strategic place on my house and my neighbor thinks it's real, so maybe not a total loss after all?

Reviews.Title: JUNK
Reviews.Author: RICHLITTLE
Reviews.Content: NOT WORTH THE MONEY...SENSOR DOES NOT TRIP UNTIL YOU ARE RIGHT NEXT TO IT.MESSAGE FROM CAMERA IS IDIOTIC.

Reviews.Title: Happy to deal with Amazon
Reviews.Author: ilovemoney01
Reviews.Content: I order this item and as I prokised I got delivery exactly nn the time frame that Amazon quotes me.I like to deal with Amazon from now on because they proofet to me that they want my business and theywill do everything to make me happy.

ProductInfo.Features:
Can be used Indoors or Outdoors. Battery compartment is under removable rain shield.
Color: Dark grey with hues of purple (Not black nor silver)
Dimensions: 5.5 inches x 3 inches x 2.5 inches (without the rain shield), 7 inches x 3 inches x 3 inches (with the rain shield)
Requires 2 AA batteries (Not Included)
This unit contains a flashing light. Economical way to deter vandalism, theft, & robberies
ProductInfo.Name: Outdoor Fake/Dummy Security Camera with Blinking Light (Color: Dark Grey with hues of Purple)
